sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular hexagon has a side length of 5cm. Find the perimeter of the hexagon.
message_2:
A regular hexagon has six equal sides. To find the perimeter, we simply multiply the side length by the number of sides:

Perimeter = side length × number of sides
Perimeter = 5 cm × 6
Perimeter = 30 cm

The perimeter of the hexagon is 30 cm.
